achievements.desc: Discover a secret passageway in Ritou.

achievements.name: Editorial Opinion
achievements.desc: Help Shigeru and Junkichi return to the right artist path.

achievements.name: You Should Start A Doushin Dojo
achievements.desc: Help Asakura train 5 times.

achievements.name: Guess Who?
achievements.desc: Find out who Zhenyu really is.

achievements.name: Well, At Least It Ended
achievements.desc: Hear Junkichi out as he puts his story together.

achievements.name: Her and Her Cat
achievements.desc: Follow Neko up Mt. Yougou to find "Hibiki"'s trail.

achievements.name: Aha! What's on the Hook?
achievements.desc: Fish some strange things up with Kayvan...

achievements.name: Kalimi's Fungus
achievements.desc: Watch Hatim make a killing on the exchange!

achievements.name: When Wealth Comes A-Knockin'
achievements.desc: Give Hatim some Apple Cider.

achievements.name: Catch Me-ow if You Can!
achievements.desc: Help Sareh find all the little cats.

achievements.name: Principia Arithmetica
achievements.desc: Help Garcia perfect his machine.

achievements.name: "It's My Job."
achievements.desc: Help Hanbei pick more mushrooms.

achievements.name: Relaxation Therapy
achievements.desc: Fulfill the 3 patients' wishes.

achievements.name: Up by the Roots
achievements.desc: Find and defeat the fleeing Whopperflower

achievements.name: Date of Departure
achievements.desc: Receive Alexandra's letter...

achievements.name: Don't Blame the Mora!
achievements.desc: Witness the Gourmet Supremos' adventures in Sumeru...

achievements.name: The Sky is Vast; The Earth...
achievements.desc: Help Farghani perform measurements.

achievements.name: Answer Time
achievements.desc: Witness Alrani's story in Sumeru.

achievements.name: The Random Circumstances of a Rose's Blooming
achievements.desc: Help Collei tend to her Sumeru Rose.

achievements.name: Where Have You Gone, My Dream?
achievements.desc: Witness the tale of Javi and the "dream."

achievements.name: Non-Obligatory Request
achievements.desc: Find all the items that Gulabgir made for his snakes.

achievements.name: The Ship Has It
achievements.desc: Help Rafiq test his ship's hull strength successfully.

achievements.name: What's the Matter?
achievements.desc: Enjoy three of Jafar's dishes.

achievements.name: Scholarly in Sumeru
achievements.desc: Answer 6 different questions correctly.

achievements.name: Nothing to Lose But Time
achievements.desc: Unlock the secrets of two sundials.

achievements.name: Interview With a Bygone God
achievements.desc: Hear the story of a bygone deity.

achievements.name: Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi
achievements.desc: Learn about the tale of the Chi.

achievements.name: Scourge of the Battlefield
achievements.desc: Fetch a good price for a treasure found in an ancient ruin...

achievements.name: Shadow Over Luhua Pool
achievements.desc: Help Vermeer get the scenery of his dreams.

achievements.name: Ready Player Zero
achievements.desc: Play a simple game with Childish Jiang.

achievements.name: Trees Should Blend Their Roots and Shade, for That Is Where the Home Is Made
achievements.desc: Witness the story of Yuan Hong's household.

achievements.name: Gears of Destiny
achievements.desc: Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".

achievements.name: The Bandit, the Lunatic, and the Pitch-Black Enigma
achievements.desc: Uncover the Grand Thief's fate.

achievements.name: Where Fate Comes to a Crossroads
achievements.desc: Escape the eerie ruins.

achievements.name: Sneering at the Power of the Gods
achievements.desc: Learn of the "Loom of Fate"...

achievements.name: Silence, You Raving Lunatic
achievements.desc: Defeat the Abyss Herald.

achievements.name: We Will Be Reunited
achievements.desc: Complete "We Will Be Reunited."

achievements.name: The Gathering Storm
achievements.desc: Earn the chance to go to Inazuma on board the Alcor.

achievements.name: Ready, Fight!
achievements.desc: Earn your first victory in The Crux Clash.

achievements.name: Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves
achievements.desc: Complete "Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves."

achievements.name: Through the Storm
achievements.desc: Reach the Outsider Settlement.

achievements.name: Hiiragi Sanjuuro
achievements.desc: Escort the goods successfully and leave Ritou.

achievements.name: The Aspirations of All
achievements.desc: Come into contact with the Statue of the Omnipresent God, the symbol of Eternity.

achievements.name: The Princess Behind the Curtain
achievements.desc: Officially make the acquaintance of the young lady of the Kamisato Clan.

achievements.name: Omamori, Justice, Number One
achievements.desc: Complete the "three small wishes."

achievements.name: Jailhouse Fiesta
achievements.desc: Rescue Masakatsu successfully.

achievements.name: To Brave the Lightning's Glow
achievements.desc: Become the target of the Vision Hunt Decree.

achievements.name: Revolutionary Outlander
achievements.desc: Successfully join the resistance.

achievements.name: The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia
achievements.desc: Complete "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia."

achievements.name: Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow
achievements.desc: Complete "Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow."

achievements.name: SWORDFISH II
achievements.desc: Obtain the trust of the Swordfish II squad.

achievements.name: Though Their Wishes Be Like Morning Dew...
achievements.desc: Find the person behind the distribution of the Delusions.

achievements.name: Fantabulous Firework Fiesta
achievements.desc: Set off fireworks to distract the guards.

achievements.name: Duel Before the Throne
achievements.desc: Emerge victorious in the duel before the throne.

achievements.name: Their Wishes
achievements.desc: Bring all the wishes upon the Statue of the Omnipresent God to fruition.

achievements.name: Omnipresence Over Mortals
achievements.desc: Complete "Omnipresence Over Mortals."

achievements.name: "All is Well"
achievements.desc: Help Wang Ping'an renovate Pervases' temple.

achievements.name: Anna's Adventures
achievements.desc: Help Anna become an adventurer.

achievements.name: Prelude to the Journey
achievements.desc: A young man is about to embark on a long journey...

achievements.name: Rise of the Jade Chamber
achievements.desc: Complete the reconstruction of the Jade Chamber.

achievements.name: Majesty of the Deep
achievements.desc: Defeat Beisht, Avenger of the Vortex.

achievements.name: A Former Dream
achievements.desc: Witness the truth of the village's history.

achievements.name: The Crane Returns on the Wind
achievements.desc: Complete "The Crane Returns on the Wind."

achievements.name: When One Gazes Into the Abyss...
achievements.desc: Though you are reunited with Dain, the Abyss is watching...

achievements.name: The Beautiful and Damned
achievements.desc: Learn the secret behind the Black Serpent Knights and the hilichurls.

achievements.name: The Will to Live and the Depths of Lamentation
achievements.desc: Defeat the Abyss Herald.

achievements.name: May Glory Go With You
achievements.desc: Complete "Requiem of the Echoing Depths"

achievements.name: No Way Home
achievements.desc: Break through the obstacles and meet up with Xiao in "Perilous Trail."

achievements.name: Layers of Fear
achievements.desc: Escape the mysterious space at the very bottom of The Chasm successfully.

achievements.name: Of Heart and Soul
achievements.desc: Complete "Perilous Trail."

achievements.name: Voice of Akasha
achievements.desc: Hear the voice of divine wisdom.

achievements.name: The Merchant and the Gate of Knowledge
achievements.desc: Meet Dori and purchase Canned Knowledge.

achievements.name: The House of Canned Time
achievements.desc: Use the Canned Knowledge to increase your combat strength.

achievements.name: Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark
achievements.desc: Complete "Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark."

achievements.name: The Flavor of Déjà Vu
achievements.desc: Pick the Sunsettia-flavored box of candy by yourself.

achievements.name: Even Paimon Wouldn't Eat That!
achievements.desc: Eat a visibly terrible Coconut Charcoal Cake.

achievements.name: All Dreams Must End With an Awakening
achievements.desc: Wake from the Sabzeruz samsara.

achievements.name: The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings
achievements.desc: Complete "The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings."

goblet.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet.description: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

plume.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume.description: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

circlet.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet.description: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

flower.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower.description: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

sands.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
sands.description: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
goblet.description: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

plume.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
plume.description: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

circlet.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
circlet.description: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

flower.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
flower.description: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

sands.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
sands.description: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

goblet.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet.description: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

plume.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume.description: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

circlet.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet.description: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

flower.name: Berserker's Rose
flower.description: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

sands.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands.description: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
goblet.description: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

plume.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
plume.description: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

circlet.name: Broken Rime's Echo
circlet.description: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

flower.name: Snowswept Memory
flower.description: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

sands.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
sands.description: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

goblet.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
goblet.description: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

plume.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
plume.description: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

circlet.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
circlet.description: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

flower.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
flower.description: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

sands.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
sands.description: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

goblet.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet.description: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

plume.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume.description: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

circlet.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet.description: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

flower.name: Medal of the Brave
flower.description: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

sands.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands.description: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet.name: Witch's Heart Flames
goblet.description: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

plume.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
plume.description: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

circlet.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
circlet.description: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

flower.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
flower.description: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

sands.name: Witch's End Time
sands.description: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

goblet.name: Lamp of the Lost
goblet.description: This was originally an oil lamp in the style of the desert realm, but has since sprouted fluorescent green leaves.

plume.name: Scholar of Vines
plume.description: An emerald leaf as fluffy as a feather. Plucked from the raiment of a forest scholar.

circlet.name: Laurel Coronet
circlet.description: This crown was bestowed by the deity with dominion over plants and trees. It was an heirloom of the royal house of the labyrinth. It was, at last, made the inheritance of the king's attendant.

flower.name: Labyrinth Wayfarer
flower.description: This lovely gold-plated flower was plucked from the crown of the ruler of the forest.

sands.name: A Time of Insight
sands.description: Such timepieces are used by those who dedicate themselves to the way of the wise. These timepieces do not contain lifeless sand, but instead play host to tiny mustard seeds.

goblet.name: Guardian's Vessel
goblet.description: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

plume.name: Guardian's Sigil
plume.description: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

circlet.name: Guardian's Band
circlet.description: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

flower.name: Guardian's Flower
flower.description: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

sands.name: Guardian's Clock
sands.description: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

goblet.name: Chalice of the Font
goblet.description: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

plume.name: Jade Leaf
plume.description: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

circlet.name: Flowing Rings
circlet.description: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.

flower.name: Soulscent Bloom
flower.description: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

sands.name: Symbol of Felicitation
sands.description: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.

goblet.name: Scarlet Vessel
goblet.description: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

plume.name: Sundered Feather
plume.description: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

circlet.name: Ornate Kabuto
circlet.description: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

flower.name: Magnificent Tsuba
flower.description: Legends hold that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

sands.name: Storm Cage
sands.description: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

goblet.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
goblet.description: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

plume.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
plume.description: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

circlet.name: Gambler's Earrings
circlet.description: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

flower.name: Gambler's Brooch
flower.description: A big, luxurious flower that can hide loaded dice.

sands.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

goblet.name: Honeyed Final Feast
goblet.description: A wine cup that was once used at a grand and ancient feast. It has now lost much of that luster.

plume.name: Feather of Judgment
plume.description: This special feather was once used to weigh the hearts of the guilty, but it has since lost its original function.

circlet.name: Shadow of the Sand King
circlet.description: This gold-inlaid headband was once used by desert priests in the days of old. They were made in imitation of one worn by a legendary ruler of the desert peoples.

flower.name: Dreaming Steelbloom
flower.description: A flower bud made of hammered dark gold. Its crimson core is wrapped by petals that shall never open.

sands.name: The Sunken Years
sands.description: This dark-golden sundial seems to tell the ancient tale of the desert.

goblet.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
goblet.description: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

plume.name: Gladiator's Destiny
plume.description: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

circlet.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
circlet.description: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

flower.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
flower.description: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

sands.name: Gladiator's Longing
sands.description: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

goblet.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
goblet.description: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

plume.name: Gust of Nostalgia
plume.description: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

circlet.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
circlet.description: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

flower.name: Gilded Corsage
flower.description: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

sands.name: Copper Compass
sands.description: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

goblet.name: Calabash of Awakening
goblet.description: A gourd that has been adorned with powdered gold and black paint. Its original color can no longer be discerned, but its main use seems to be as a performance prop.

plume.name: Plume of Luxury
plume.description: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

circlet.name: Skeletal Hat
circlet.description: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

flower.name: Bloom Times
flower.description: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

sands.name: Song of Life
sands.description: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

goblet.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
goblet.description: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

plume.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
plume.description: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

circlet.name: Instructor's Cap
circlet.description: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

flower.name: Instructor's Brooch
flower.description: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

sands.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

goblet.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
goblet.description: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

plume.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
plume.description: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

circlet.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
circlet.description: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

flower.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
flower.description: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

sands.name: Lavawalker's Torment
sands.description: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

goblet.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
goblet.description: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

plume.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
plume.description: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

circlet.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
circlet.description: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

flower.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
flower.description: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

sands.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
sands.description: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

goblet.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
goblet.description: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

plume.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
plume.description: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

circlet.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
circlet.description: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

flower.name: Maiden's Distant Love
flower.description: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

sands.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
sands.description: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

goblet.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet.description: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

plume.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume.description: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

circlet.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet.description: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

flower.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower.description: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

sands.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands.description: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet.name: Royal Silver Urn
goblet.description: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

plume.name: Royal Plume
plume.description: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

circlet.name: Royal Masque
circlet.description: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

flower.name: Royal Flora
flower.description: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

sands.name: Royal Pocket Watch
sands.description: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

goblet.name: Pearl Cage
goblet.description: The shining pearls that the shrine maidens of Watatsumi Island offer up shine eternally and never dim.

plume.name: Deep Palace's Plume
plume.description: A down feather with the same hue as coral, said to come from a shrine maiden's ceremonial garment.

circlet.name: Crown of Watatsumi
circlet.description: An ancient, intricate crown that was once used by a forgotten clergy member. Today, this relic has been enshrined with great ceremony by the people of Watatsumi.

flower.name: Sea-Dyed Blossom
flower.description: A soft flower that has taken on the many shades of the capricious ocean. It shines with wondrous colors under the moon's silver light.

sands.name: Cowry of Parting
sands.description: A clean, flawless seashell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

goblet.name: Surpassing Cup
goblet.description: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

plume.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
plume.description: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

circlet.name: Mocking Mask
circlet.description: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

flower.name: Stainless Bloom
flower.description: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

sands.name: Moment of Cessation
sands.description: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Torrents
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

circlet.name: Tiara of Flame
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

circlet.name: Tiara of Thunder
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

circlet.name: Tiara of Frost
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

goblet.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet.description: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

plume.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume.description: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

circlet.name: Crown of Parting
circlet.description: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

flower.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower.description: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

sands.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands.description: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet.description: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

plume.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume.description: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

circlet.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet.description: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

flower.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower.description: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

sands.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands.description: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
goblet.description: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

plume.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
plume.description: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

circlet.name: Scholar's Lens
circlet.description: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

flower.name: Scholar's Bookmark
flower.description: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

sands.name: Scholar's Clock
sands.description: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

goblet.name: Hopeful Heart
goblet.description: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

plume.name: Shaft of Remembrance
plume.description: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

circlet.name: Capricious Visage
circlet.description: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

flower.name: Entangling Bloom
flower.description: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

sands.name: Morning Dew's Moment
sands.description: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

goblet.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
goblet.description: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

plume.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
plume.description: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

circlet.name: General's Ancient Helm
circlet.description: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

flower.name: Flower of Accolades
flower.description: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer.

sands.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
sands.description: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

goblet.name: Exile's Goblet
goblet.description: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

plume.name: Exile's Feather
plume.description: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

circlet.name: Exile's Circlet
circlet.description: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

flower.name: Exile's Flower
flower.description: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

sands.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
sands.description: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

goblet.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
goblet.description: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

plume.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
plume.description: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

circlet.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
circlet.description: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

flower.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
flower.description: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

sands.name: Hourglass of Thunder
sands.description: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

goblet.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
goblet.description: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

plume.name: Thundersoother's Plume
plume.description: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

circlet.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
circlet.description: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

flower.name: Thundersoother's Heart
flower.description: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

sands.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
sands.description: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

goblet.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
goblet.description: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

plume.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
plume.description: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

circlet.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
circlet.description: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

flower.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
flower.description: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

sands.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
sands.description: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

goblet.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
goblet.description: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

plume.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
plume.description: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

circlet.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
circlet.description: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

flower.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
flower.description: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

sands.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

goblet.name: Moment of the Pact
goblet.description: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

plume.name: Feather of Nascent Light
plume.description: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

circlet.name: Thundering Poise
circlet.description: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

flower.name: Flowering Life
flower.description: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

sands.name: Solar Relic
sands.description: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

goblet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
goblet.description: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

plume.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
plume.description: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

circlet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
circlet.description: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

flower.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
flower.description: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

sands.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
sands.description: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

goblet.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
goblet.description: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

plume.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
plume.description: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

circlet.name: Conductor's Top Hat
circlet.description: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

flower.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
flower.description: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

sands.name: Concert's Final Hour
sands.description: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

bait.name: Fake Fly Bait
bait.description:
Mimetic fly bait made from vibrantly-colored materials. It has no scent, and is specialized to attract large fish with sharp vision. It is often well-suited to more advanced angling techniques. The fishing associations of various regions regard the skilled use of such bait as one of the conditions for its members' advancement in rank.

Suitable for catching Koi, Pufferfish, and Rays.

bait.name: False Worm Bait
bait.description:
This imitation worm bait is made mostly out of condensate, and will twist its body according to the underwater currents, resulting in its fatal attraction to overly-curious fish. Professionals will even add some fruit to it to increase its fragrance and make it utterly irresistable.

Suitable for catching Shirakodai and Angelfish.

bait.name: Fruit Paste Bait
bait.description:
A very commonly-seen bait made from mashing, fermenting, and kneading Sunsettias and Wheat together. It atomizes very quickly upon hitting the water and exerts an incredible attraction on small fish. Due to the ease of its making, cheap price, and its excellent efficacy, it has also been jokingly called the "Fisher's Trusty Treasure."

Suitable for catching Medakas, Dawncatchers, and Crystalfish.

bait.name: Redrot Bait
bait.description:
Fish bait made from mixing Dendrobium and mashed meat. The unique rank sweetness of this bait spreads very quickly in the water, attracting fierce aquatic predators. Use with caution, however! Put too much of this bait down and you might hook in nastier customers than you bargained for!

Suitable for catching Sticklebacks, Bettas, Venomspine Fish, Akai Maou, and Snowstriders.

bait.name: Sugardew Bait
bait.description:
The bait is based on rose dew and has been mixed with sun-dried Harra Fruit powder. It has a spicy taste and a sweet aftertaste, just like the life of a fisherman. The harvest after going through all the weather-beaten days and roaring waves is particularly gratifying.

Suitable for: Angler and Axe Marlin.

characters.name: Albedo
characters.title: Kreideprinz
characters.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
skills.description:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

Solar Isotoma
has the following properties:
·When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
·Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
·Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.

Hold to designate the location of the skill.
skills.info: This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

skills.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
skills.description:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
skills.info: Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

passives.name: Calcite Might
passives.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passives.name: Homuncular Nature
passives.description: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passives.name: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.description:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

characters.name: Aloy
characters.title: Savior From Another World
characters.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Rapid Fire
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frozen Wilds
skills.description:
Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing Cryo DMG. After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing Cryo DMG.
When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack.
Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s.

Coil
·Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG.
·When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to Cryo DMG.

While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks.
Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.
skills.info: You think that's cold? Guess you've never been to The Cut.

attributes.label: Rushing Ice Normal Attack DMG Bonus

skills.name: Prophecies of Dawn
skills.description: Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.info: Whether "Zero Dawn" referred to hope or extinction no longer matters. Aloy has already saved her world, and the fate of this one is still being forged by its own heroes.

passives.name: Combat Override
passives.description: When Aloy receives the Coil effect from Frozen Wilds, her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

passives.name: Strong Strike
passives.description: When Aloy is in the Rushing Ice state conferred by Frozen Wilds, her Cryo DMG Bonus increases by 3.5% every 1s. A maximum Cryo DMG Bonus increase of 35% can be gained in this way.

passives.name: Easy Does It
passives.description: When Aloy is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

characters.name: Amber
characters.title: Gliding Champion
characters.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Explosive Puppet
skills.description:
The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.

Baron Bunny
·Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
·Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
·When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Hold
Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
skills.info: Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

skills.name: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.
skills.info: Amber's passion truly burns hot.

passives.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.name: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: Gliding Champion
passives.description:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

characters.name: Arataki Itto
characters.title: Hanamizaka Heroics
characters.description: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

skills.name: Normal Attack: Fight Club Legend
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
When the 2nd and 4th strikes hit opponents, Itto will gain 1 and 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength, respectively.
Max 5 stacks. Triggering this effect will refresh the current duration of any existing stacks.

Additionally, Itto's Normal Attack combo does not immediately reset after sprinting or using his Elemental Skill, "Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!"

Charged Attack
When holding to perform a Charged Attack, Itto unleashes a series of Arataki Kesagiri slashes without consuming Stamina. Instead, each Arataki Kesagiri slash consumes 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. When the final stack is consumed, Itto delivers a powerful final slash.
If no stacks of Superlative Superstrength are available, Itto will perform a single Saichimonji Slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!
skills.description:
Hurls Ushi, the young akaushi bull and auxiliary member of the Arataki Gang, dealing Geo DMG to opponents on hit. When Ushi hits opponents, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.

Ushi will remain on the field and provide support in the following ways:
· Taunts surrounding opponents and draws their attacks.
· Inherits HP based on a percentage of Arataki Itto's Max HP.
· When Ushi takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Only 1 stack can be gained in this way every 2s.
· Ushi will flee when its HP reaches 0 or its duration ends. It will grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength when it leaves.

Hold
Adjust throwing angle.

Ushi is considered a Geo construct. Arataki Itto can only deploy 1 Ushi on the field at any one time.
skills.info: The name of this technique is derived from Onibudou (a light novel series written by Junkichi). However, calling it "Onisatsu Zetsugi" probably constitutes copyright infringement — not to mention how Itto himself is an oni and all...

skills.name: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!
skills.description:
Time to show 'em the might of the Arataki Gang! For a time, Itto lets out his inner Raging Oni King, wielding his Oni King's Kanabou in battle.
This state has the following special properties:
· Converts Itto's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks to Geo DMG. This cannot be overridden.
· Increases Itto's Normal Attack SPD. Also increases his ATK based on his DEF.
· On hit, the 1st and 3rd strikes of his attack combo will each grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.
· Decreases Itto's Elemental and Physical RES by 20%.

The Raging Oni King state will be cleared when Itto leaves the field.
skills.info:
This is the pinnacle technique of the ultimate fighting style (according to Itto). It would be pointless for Arataki Itto to reference any other fighting styles to improve his own, for he, and no other, is the strongest, most terrible oni in the land.
Shouta thinks it looks really cool.

passives.name: Arataki Ichiban
passives.description:
When Arataki Itto uses consecutive Arataki Kesagiri, he obtains the following effects:
· Each slash increases the ATK SPD of the next slash by 10%. Max ATK SPD increase is 30%.
· Increases his resistance to interruption.

These effects will be cleared once he stops performing consecutive slashes.

passives.name: Bloodline of the Crimson Oni
passives.description: Arataki Kesagiri DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto's DEF.

passives.name: Woodchuck Chucked
passives.description: When a party member uses attacks to obtain wood from a tree, they have a 25% chance to get an additional log of wood.

constellations.name: Stay a While and Listen Up
constellations.description: After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

constellations.name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
constellations.description:
After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, each party member whose Element is Geo will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

constellations.name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
constellations.description: When the Raging Oni King state caused by Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Arataki Itto, Present!
constellations.description: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses Arataki Kesagiri, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

characters.name: Barbara
characters.title: Shining Idol
characters.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Whisper of Water
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Let the Show Begin♪
skills.description:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them.

Melody Loop
·On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
·On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
·Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
·Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.
skills.info: Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

skills.name: Shining Miracle♪
skills.description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
skills.info: Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

passives.name: Glorious Season
passives.description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin♪'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passives.name: Encore
passives.description:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of Let the Show Begin♪ is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

passives.name: With My Whole Heart♪
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.description: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.description:
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.description:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.description:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

characters.name: Beidou
characters.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
characters.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller
skills.description:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

Press
Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

Hold
Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
The shield possesses the following properties:
·Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
·Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.
skills.info: Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

skills.name: Stormbreaker
skills.description:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents.

Thunderbeast's Targe
·When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG.
·Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.

A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.
skills.info: With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

passives.name: Retribution
passives.description: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Lightning Storm
passives.description:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
·DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
·Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

passives.name: Conqueror of Tides
passives.description:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.description:
When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.description: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.description: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.description: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

characters.name: Bennett
characters.title: Trial by Fire
characters.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Passion Overload
skills.description:
Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...

Press
A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.

Hold (Short)
Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
·Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents.
·Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
skills.info: An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

skills.name: Fantastic Voyage
skills.description:
Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

Inspiration Field
·If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
·If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
·Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.
skills.info: Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

passives.name: Rekindle
passives.description: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.

passives.name: Fearnaught
passives.description:
Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects:
·CD is reduced by 50%.
·Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

passives.name: It Should Be Safe...
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.description: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.description:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures With Me
constellations.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

characters.name: Chongyun
characters.title: Frozen Ardor
characters.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Demonbane
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo.
skills.info: "A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.description:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents.
skills.info: "As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"

passives.name: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passives.name: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

passives.name: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description:
Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

characters.name: Collei
characters.title: Sprout of Rebirth
characters.description: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Supplicant's Bowmanship
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, Dendro energy will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Dendro DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Floral Brush
skills.description:
Throws out a Floral Ring that deals 1 instance of Dendro DMG to targets it comes into contact with.
The Floral Ring will return after a set time, dealing Dendro DMG once again.
skills.info: This is Collei's go-to gadget for dealing with unruly wild beasts. A few good thwacks from this tool will generally improve their behavior. This same principle works just as well on evildoers.

skills.name: Trump-Card Kitty
skills.description:
Trusty Cuilein-Anbar comes to save the day!
Throws the doll named Cuilein-Anbar, causing an explosion that deals AoE Dendro DMG, creating a Cuilein-Anbar Zone. Cuilein-Anbar will bounce around within this zone, dealing AoE Dendro DMG.
skills.info: "Pretty impressive, huh? ... Eh? You want to know how I came up with the name Cuilein-Anbar? Uh, well, I..."

passives.name: Floral Sidewinder
passives.description:
If one of your party members has triggered Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions before the Floral Ring returns, it will grant the character the Sprout effect upon return, which will continuously deal Dendro DMG equivalent to 40% of Collei's ATK to nearby opponents for 3s.
If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed. DMG dealt by Sprout is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

passives.name: The Languid Wood
passives.description:
When a character within the Cuilein-Anbar Zone triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Zone's duration will be increased by 1s.
A single Trump-Card Kitty can be extended by up to 3s.

passives.name: Gliding Champion of Sumeru
passives.description:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Deepwood Patrol
constellations.description: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Through Hill and Copse
constellations.description:
The Passive Talent Floral Sidewinder is changed to this:
The Floral Ring will grant the character the Sprout effect from Floral Sidewinder upon return, dealing 40% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG to nearby opponents for 3s.
From the moment of using Floral Brush to the moment when this instance of Sprout effect ends, if any of your party members triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Sprout effect will be extended by 3s.
The Sprout effect can only be extended this way once. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed. DMG dealt by Sprout is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Requires you to have unlocked the Floral Sidewinder Passive Talent.

constellations.name: Scent of Summer
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Floral Brush by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Gift of the Woods
constellations.description: Using Trump-Card Kitty will increase all nearby characters' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s (not including Collei herself).

constellations.name: All Embers
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Trump-Card Kitty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forest of Falling Arrows
constellations.description:
When the Floral Ring hits, it will create a miniature Cuilein-Anbar that will deal 200% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG.
Each Floral Brush can only create one such miniature Cuilein-Anbar.

characters.name: Diluc
characters.title: Dark Side of Dawn
characters.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.description:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

This skill can be consecutively used 3 times.
Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.
skills.info: The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.description:
Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.
skills.info: The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

passives.name: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passives.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.description:
Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

characters.name: Diona
characters.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
characters.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

Press
Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

Hold
Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.
